name: TypeIIDiabetes
title: Type II Diabetes
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for a diagnosis of  type II diabetes mellitus.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a diagnosis of diabetes mellitus, type II with and without complications.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent a diagnosis of gestational diabetes or steroid-induced diabetes.)
